item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-07-17
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Starbucks (474 Woodward St, Wyman St, Waban). #
  • I'm at O'Haras Pub (1185 Walnut St., Newton). #
  • I'm at Terminal C - Boston Logan Int'l Airport (BOS) (Terminal C, Logan Airport, Boston) w/ 2 others. #
  • I'm at Flour Bakery & Cafe (12 Farnsworth St, Congress St, Boston). #
